website_summaries.verdict: This user-friendly measuring wheel can cover a lot of territory with ease and collapses for compact storage.
pros: Kickstand holds the wheel upright when not in use
cons: Some users say it is difficult to keep the handle connected to the wheel

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. See photo
customer_reviews.text: This piece of junk broke after only 1 use. I used it to measure the perimeter around my house and left it in storage. Today, I was about to use it again and took the measuring wheel out of its carrying case and began to extend the device, only for the cheap plastic joint to break on me. Very disappointed. Certainly not worthy of having an "industrial" title.
customer_reviews.author: jacob lauer

customer_reviews.title: A Tireless Workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: I'm well acquainted with measuring wheels after a long spell as a roads engineer; i've used a bunch of them years and this is up there with the best of them. You get a measuring wheel, calibrated in feet and a sturdy bag in which to store it. The wheel is collapsible and also comes with a stand. The stand is a nice touch but can really only be used on very level, hard ground. On grass the feet are small enough that the whole thing refuses to stand and will tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Parts availability
customer_reviews.text: Good product initially. Worked as it was supposed to. Used in the field sometimes. Well a little plastic piece broke that engaged the wheel in order to measure. Contacted the company to see if they would sell me a replacement part. Checked and they still sell the same measuring wheel but no parts. Then they offered to sell me a new one for a couple bucks less than amazon. If you are looking to buy this one consider another because the plastic is very brittle and the company will not stand behind the product. For a little piece of plastic that was probably 50 cents mine ended up in the TRASH!
customer_reviews.author: Trout Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and plenty sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and presumably accurate. Heavy duty enough for normal wear and tear. I don't know what one reviewer mentioned about the hinge being cheap and breaking... If you are not trying to walk up the handle or use it to pole vault, the handle and sliding hinge latch mechanism is PLENTY strong and relatively unbreakable. I think it works great and should last longer than me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Leiphart

customer_reviews.title: Measure far, measure true!
customer_reviews.text: this is a great little device. Very accurate and easy to use and it is built well. I'm so glad I purchased it as it has saved me from over purchasing large gage electrical wire that is not cheap. I've measured several times and always within a foot or two over a 400 foot run and checked and checked with a 50 foot and 100 foot tape measure and it is always right on plus or minus and inch or two. the kickstand works well too!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you need precise measurements. There is too much play in the wheel and it is not accurate. However, I decided to keep it as I am measuring out gardening space so I don't have to be super accurate. If you need a measuring wheel for professional use, this is not the one because it is super inaccurate. I have to remeasure several times but it's still better than trying to use a tape measure. I do not recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The wheel measure very accurate yet I wish it had ...
customer_reviews.text: The wheel measure very accurate yet I wish it had a drag setting on it b/c if you do not pay attention it will keep rolling when you pick it up. It is very touchy.
customer_reviews.author: hersh12307

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased 20 acres of raw land so wanted to measure out boundaries etc.. I quickly fell in love with this measuring wheel and now basically looking for excuses to use it more often.. Lol. Folds up really nicely and comes with a great canvas bag to keep it in. Light weight and super easy to use. Anyone want me to come over and measure something?!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Diffie

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I was little, I have wanted one of these. Don't ask me why, I just thought they were cool. Obviously, "cool" isn't a good enough reason to purchase this particular item as it serves an actual purpose, but lo and behold I finally needed it to measure my property lines and boom, I finally got to buy one. I was able to measure my property lines accurately and efficiently. It even has a stand and a carrying bag if you are going to be doing something like this all day.
customer_reviews.author: skwirly88

customer_reviews.title: Got the wheel ahead of time and started using right ...
customer_reviews.text: . I wanted to update my review of this wheel, after several times of use it will not measure the same distance twice. You can roll a distance on a pave street and mark it out turn around and reset the wheel and you will not get the same measurement on the same roll. Should have spent the money on a better quality wheel.
customer_reviews.author: clark

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and well worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this to measure out the amount of edging I needed around my landscape beds. I have since found so many other uses for it around the house. It works great and in very accurate. It fold down nicely to stow away under a cabinet. Great buy as I think it will last for a good while!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas G

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help plan outdoor projects and it works great. Much cheaper than other alternatives. Seems to be very solidly made. I won't be using it commercially / for real estate so I won't be able to assess it on a frequent-use basis. I was concerned since the stated size of it seemed to indicate that I would have to stoop to use it but that is not the case. I am about 6' and using it was no problem. It folds compactly and has a nice storage bag. Overall, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stone

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to do with the measuring wheel
customer_reviews.text: Used it to measure a web of trails through the meadows, thickets, and woods with significant changes in altitude. Very easy to do with the measuring wheel.
customer_reviews.author: JEROME M HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Some people mention the folding joint breaking. The instructions mention aligning the white arrows. If you don't do this you can force the connection and break the connector. Follow the instructions and you will not have a problem. Measured distance with tape measure and with the wheel. Same distance. Works good.
customer_reviews.author: Twister

customer_reviews.title: Concerned about quality
customer_reviews.text: Wheel cover was broken out of the box. (See photo). It's still functional and seems to work well. Haven't been able to check for accuracy yet but other reviews seem to support that claim. The portion where the device arm clicks into place when folded (See photo) doesn't hold well. In other words, if you carry it by the handle while it's folded it tends to pop open and swing loose. This is an annoyance for me because I carry this device up and down ladders to measure roofs.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Outdoor Measuring
customer_reviews.text: There are a couple of projects I am working on and needed something to measure long distances outdoors. This tool fills my needs now and in the future. Currently need to run a new water line from road to house and shop, also planning on getting someone to pour a concrete drive. This makes computing material cost so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE H.

customer_reviews.title: Works good accurate measurement sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice wheel, heavy, works good accurate measurement. I am an insurance inspector and have to measure buildings for values and to get square footage. I had a Stanley I bought some time ago for $100 charged to work and it fell apart handle broke etc it was just wobbly. This one is good, recommend it especially for the price. This small ones at harbor freight don't work well at all. Buy this one if you need a wheel, it seems fine. The handle works ok you just have to line it up before locking into place.
customer_reviews.author: debbiker54

customer_reviews.title: Close but still a failure
customer_reviews.text: The counter is great and the counter keeps you from accidentally resetting it BUT........ in the middle of unit there is a small handle and as hard as your try it is impossible to keep your hands off it. When you touch it the handle clasps and it is like having a car wreck over and over and over. I would not purchase it again at any price.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Bouldin

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after first use seems cheaply built not for estimators who use this day to day
customer_reviews.text: Used it once. Second time stopped working. Would not reset to zero. With only advance intermittently when we all would spend. No option to replace defective part. Only option was a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Son of a GV

customer_reviews.title: So much handier than a tape
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It’s so easy to use. I have measured for fencing, irrigation pipe, bark, gravel, fertilizer and edging. I have figured out my 1/4 acre paddock is closer to 1/2 acre and I under seeded it. The mechanism seems well made but I make certain it is stored out of the way and I am very gentle with the reset lever. I did get the reset lever caught on a fence post 1000 feet into measuring a fence line and it went straight to zero...not the devices fault but something to look out for none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Greatly disappointed in this item. It was non-operational out of the box. I don't know the reason why, but I suspect shoddy manufacturing, quality control, or materials.
customer_reviews.author: Reason_trumps_emotion

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it, I’m landscaper and this pass weekend I did an estimate of a mulch job using this wheel, I was impressed of how Good this wheel measure the yards and basing on my wheel estimation ft I give my costumer a estimation of 13yrds to complete the job. I complete the job yesterday and it took 12 YARDS!! to complete the job!, man this measuring wheel rocks!!
customer_reviews.author: Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This wheel didn't work from day one. It would measure until some random number less than 100-ft and then the gears would catch and stop turning. This is very annoying when using for work under traffic. Plus each time to try and measure more it had to be reset which you either have to lift the wheel to do or bend over -- all of which takes time. Wish I could rate it '0' stars. Save your money & look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Devine

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to do and does it right
customer_reviews.text: I am a home inspector for home owners insurance companies. I measure the outside of houses, decks, porches, fences etc. Been using this wheel for 5 months. It gets rough treatment then gets put in the trunk till I get to the next house. It is durable, accurate, easy to read. Does exactly what its supposed to do. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: NJM

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to break the hinge
customer_reviews.text: Let's just say the hinge is not "intuitive". Second time using, try to use it, break it. Problem is, as nice as this thing is, it's too inexpensive for them to sell a replacement hinge. Now I have to tape the middle of the thing up to have it permanently extended. Is it my fault that I'm blonde inside? Probably. Still, just like I idiot proofed things for my employees, this should have been better idiot proofed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sprouse

customer_reviews.title: Everything you want, including a bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, big wheel, folds/unfolds easily once you get the hang of it. Kickstand, easy counter, carry bag. It's got everything you want, including a low price. The warranty is kind of comical though. One line telling you what they cover, then ten lines spelling out what they won't. For 30 something dollars delivered, though, I don't think many people will send it in for repair.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitrios Panagakos

customer_reviews.title: Works, but is large
customer_reviews.text: I work in physical therapy and use these for measuring distance walked by patients. I didn't realize how large the wheel was on this or how heavy it was, but it is still workable. It measures distances consistently and works for what I need overall.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Love

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket if you need to measure long distances.
customer_reviews.text: Having just bought an old farm and needing to do lots of measuring of buildings and fields, I needed a robust, accurate and usable measuring tool. This tool is exactly that. It works as advertised and meets all of my measuring needs. It comes with a bag and folds easily to fit in the bag. It has a kickstand which works on firm ground but isn't really much use in a pasture.
customer_reviews.author: George Rickerson

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It is comparable to the measuring wheels you see at specialty stores, but for half the price. Love the carrying bag since it keeps the inside of my truck free from mud and dirt from wheel. Good product overall. Only complain is the handle locking mechanism, I wish it was a bit more secure and sturdy, still not a deal breaker by any means.
customer_reviews.author: rafael

customer_reviews.title: Mound to Home plate no problem with this bad-boy!
customer_reviews.text: The kickstand really takes lazy to an all new level. This thing is great. I use it constantly with my son for baseball. I don't leave bases in the yard, so I measure out what we need for practice, etc. Seems accurate and is a breeze to use. The case is awesome, though it has no padding. I wouldn't throw this thing around, but for the price, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: McGraw317

customer_reviews.title: Won't make the mistake a 3rd time.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these thinking the first time it broke was due to how I was using it. But nope, the second one broke just a month later. Don't buy, the counter gears mess up too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dessa L. Noble

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid - Used it in the rain and over rough terrain and when I compared it against traditional measuring methods, it was always spot-on. Easy to use and stores away nicely in the provided bag after easily collapsing down. The carry bag is poor quality so be careful how you handle that, but I have nothing but good marks for the device itself.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R. Darden

customer_reviews.title: Good for measuring arceage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to measure field acreage for reports to the USDA. My old wheel, homemade, just wasn't accurate enough, especially over short distances. It seems to be well-made, and as long as I don't misuse it it should hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Good value, lightweight and easy to store. Much better than Lufkin and half the price and weight. I find the Lufkin readout keeps sticking. I’ve had no issues with this wheel in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Detached Observor

customer_reviews.title: Great experience and item
customer_reviews.text: Great experience!! The first one I ordered didn't function as easily as it should, another was immediately sent out which worked/works great and all I had to do to was box up the first one, drop off and was then also immediately refunded....seamless return!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use... very useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take lots of measurements on my property, and find it far easier and more accurate than a tape measure. It's a piece of cake to setup, use and stow. This one seems sturdy enough for home use and comes with a case to stow it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: This wheel works great and is an improvement of what I'm used to. The large wheel allows me to traverse terrain that I otherwise would not be able to. The stand is really nice too; as I have to drop other measuring wheels in order to write down a measurement.
customer_reviews.author: D&J

customer_reviews.title: Ended up using for projects I didn't know I had!
customer_reviews.text: Can't imagine much better for the money. Was just over $30 and is perfectly functional, and even comes with storage/carry bag. I've used this for more than what I bought it for. Bought it for 1 specific measuring task I needed done. Then, when you have something that can do what this can, you find you benefit from being able to measure distance for lots of different reasons. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Don E

customer_reviews.title: This has been a lifesaver for building a new house
customer_reviews.text: I've used this countless times. Great value when building a new house. It is accurate and is so much easier than shrining a tape measure along.
customer_reviews.author: fly747

customer_reviews.title: I think it is well built for what it is.  Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers complain of the week plastic folding link. I agree it is not real strong but IMO if you use common sense and a little care when unfolding and locking it and when folding back up it should endure well. Once the support / locking sleeve is slid over the joint it doesn't seem too fragile. It does the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: d'mal

customer_reviews.title: Great for measuring pastures.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of options for measuring, but many were pretty expensive. This was reasonably priced, highly rated and did everything I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use, around the yard
customer_reviews.text: This is terrific. Very affordable and easy to use. Comes with a carrying bag, and a folding handle. Seems to work well, and appears to be well made. I'm glad I trusted the other positive reviews, and went with this model. It's perfect for home use, around the yard for measuring out garden beds and such.
customer_reviews.author: wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Weak product. Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: This product fell apart. I do not recommend. The twist style storage breakdown mechanism is weak. The measuring mechanism fell apart. This product has been replaced. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sully

customer_reviews.title: like it - great price
customer_reviews.text: works great, seems tight, I like the storage bag. Will admit I have not checked for accuracy but I'm also not making watches so it has been everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Best to use every day
customer_reviews.text: I have been a surveyor and engineer for the last 3 years and this has been the best of I have come across, along with great pricing. Don't hesitate to grab the tools you need to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hoyer

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this measuring wheel for quite a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this measuring wheel for quite a while now as we prepare a new home site. I have used it for a lot of other misc things outside around our current home. I have had no issues with it and the price point is where I would expect it to be for such a tool. The ones at the major hardware retail outlets are way too expensive for me to only use it once or twice a month.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Works great for measuring baseball distances!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to mark off distances for my 2 sons' baseball long-toss throwing program and pitching/baseline distances for practicing in the back yard and it has worked great! Easy enough to use that my 10-yr old can do it and it seems to be pretty durable so far (used pretty regularly for 2 months).
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I wish I can return this product, it is poorly made just used it 2x and part of the plastic holding the wheel fell off. Also it is reading it inaccurately, I had to use regular tape measure.
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very handy - a little effort goes into an exact reading as it can easily turn just before you put it down but it's not a big deal if you are ok with being within an inch or 2 of exact measurement. It seems as though it would take some effort to break it
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Wildly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: When I checked the accuracy with tape measure this product was wildly inaccurate. It would be perfectly on target one time and up to a foot of in 20 feet other times. I would recommend spending more money or renting one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use it for measuring the square footage of my lawn for pre-emergent application.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: It’s for casual use not commercial grade.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and intuitive. I use this to get an estimate of how many feet I need to run electrical wiring on across a large property. It was pretty damn close to what electric company quoted for distance. I can attribute some of the variance to me walking in a not so straight line. I love it and I use it to measure campsites and distances. Solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Measure easily and efficiently!
customer_reviews.text: Efficient and ready to use right out of the nifty storage pouch. Measures accurately and easily, feet and inches counter is easy to read and then reset. I have measured a variety of inside dimensions and look forward to using outside on a variety of surfaces. Well done TR Industrial.
customer_reviews.author: cookin' dude

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomended
customer_reviews.text: Collapses and sets up quick and easy. The kickstand is so nice, now I don't have to fumble and juggle everything as I record measurements. The price and quality are fantastic. I reccomend this one to anyone looking for one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did exactly what I wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little lighter weight than I anticipated. And the knob to shorten the handle was a little hard to push. I think that was because of my arthritis in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: The wheel seemed bigger in the picture
customer_reviews.text: works great on hard surface, but my opinion it needs a taller wheel for grass
customer_reviews.author: Eddie P.

customer_reviews.title: Performs well over rough terrain as well as paved surfaces..
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for my Boy Scout troop. I cannot testify to the accuracy but it works easily over rough terrain or paved surfaces. The 'kick stand' is a nice touch and it folds readily into the included bag. I can see how it would be easy to break if you manhandle it or are not mechanically inclined.
customer_reviews.author: Burkhale

customer_reviews.title: First Class
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised the quality of this item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Normal Person

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This measuring wheel works well. I like the large wheel. It is easy to reset and use. I packs well, and the carry bag is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brent D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I run a fencing company so it is vitally important to get good measurements when I'm doing bids. I've spent three times as much on different tools that did not work as well as this one does. I bought it as a spare, but it is now my main source for getting my measurements. It is built well, and the fact that it will fold in half and fit in a storage bag is even better. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CONVENIENCE AND MORE EXACT MEASUREMENT
customer_reviews.text: NEEDED ONE OF THESE FOR YEARS, THIS ONE WORKS GREAT. A WIND UP TAPE MEASURE WOULD COST AS MUCH, ONE OF THE LONGER ONES AND NOT NEAR AS CONVENIENT OR EXACT. THIS COMES WITH A ZIP UP POUCH, SO YOU FOLD IT UP AND STORE IT AWAY.
customer_reviews.author: close2right

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Haven't Used it yet but the quality is better than expected. Athens only thing is they say use on flat service for accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: AgingShopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and slip back in the trunk
customer_reviews.text: Easy to slip out of it’s carry bag and walk off what I need to measure then drop the handle and tuck it back in its carry bag. Just what I needed and doesn’t take up much room in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple, seems sturdy, and I love the non-electronic aspect of it - just a simple mechanical counter. The last one I used was not nearly as nice. I also really like the way it folds, how light it is and the handy case that it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Paul7

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. I was running network cables from every room in my house to a centrally located switch. I used this to determine how long each cable needed to be. It was super easy to use and I had all of the lengths worked out in no time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use very accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is very accurate easy to use and easy to read . I used this to measure my .65 acre property . Worked great .
customer_reviews.author: Drew Richards

customer_reviews.title: Love the case and how it folds down
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for year measurements and am glad I did. This is easy to use and breaks down nicely and fits into an included carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: J. Call

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to work as intended. After first use, the handle holder broke. It seems to be made poorly.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done and even goes backwards and takes distance off! Better than a more expensive one I had!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hylton

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied professional
customer_reviews.text: As a frequent user of these products I can attest to its construction and general usability as a measuring instrument. I am very satisfied with its performance and price
customer_reviews.author: Kevin k

customer_reviews.title: broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: had to abandon at site since it wouldn't collapse to bring back with me.
customer_reviews.author: GeeBee

customer_reviews.title: very accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: do you like measuring distances? do you hate using a tape measure to measure those distances? you'll love this thing. my wife bought it for her rel estate business and was so excited when it came she went out and measured our property right away. very accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel measurer
customer_reviews.text: Great measuring wheel. It took me a bit to figure out how to telescope the handle (move and twist the grab handle). Otherwise works great to measure streets and out door venues. The kickstand feature works, it suports the weight of the stand. Comes with a carrying bag. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Crish

customer_reviews.title: Must have when measuring large areas
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for measuring large areas, it is accurate, easy to use an easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetLovrr

customer_reviews.title: Brother loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my brother and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Used day one. This is a great tool to add to anyone that does projects. I use to measure lawns.
customer_reviews.author: TheMayor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, big wheel a must have
customer_reviews.text: Big wheel is a must have if you intend to use it in any kind of dirt or uneven surface. The ones with the smaller wheels just dont do well. This one is great, it folds up, and its durable.
customer_reviews.author: Gollum

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of equipment. Quality is great and I’m very please with it. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Item is as described. Very quick shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet. Turned it on, all seemed to work. Came in a nice case. Hopefully it will make life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Jelinek

customer_reviews.title: Excwllent item
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for each of my staff...excellent quality and value
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dog

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful tool. Saves me lots of time
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful tool. Saves me lots of time. Not having to have someone hold the other end of a tape is great. Wish I had bought one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the lucking and unlocking handle prevent damage to wheel that happens on others without this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Mc Donald

customer_reviews.title: Wheel of integrity
customer_reviews.text: I really like this measuring wheel. It is compact and easy to use right from the carton. The carrying case is a plus! I purchased this as an additional measuring tool and this one will probably be the only one I use. It can go across gravel and through 6 or 8 inch grass, maybe even higher as I did not have an area taller to test it on. It has an easy reset, no waiting for a LED reset readout.
customer_reviews.author: Ron D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and seems like good quality out of the box. Comes with a decent carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Simple readings
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read and maneuvers great also very simple to reset.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Young

customer_reviews.title: Know your property lines.
customer_reviews.text: Having landscaping done in January. Purchased to help locate my property lines. Have to keep things legal.
customer_reviews.author: ALANNAH F.

customer_reviews.title: Good thru tall grass
customer_reviews.text: Lasts and i take it with me everywhere! Great for all my estimates
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It works great, has a built in stand, plus a nice zippered case to store it in. The handle folds so you can store it in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great way to measure distance
customer_reviews.text: I live on 5 acres and we plant a lot of things and was always pulling out the 100 foot tape for different things. When my wife bought this I wondered why? But have found myself using it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hart

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It seems very sturdy. Based on the reviews and the cost, I was expecting it to be lightweight and flimsy. I don't use it every week but so far so good. I think I would buy a second one as I share this with a colleague. We'll see though
customer_reviews.author: JAGS

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel.
customer_reviews.text: Much more accurate than my smaller wheel. Had to press down to get the older one to register more accurately. Not so with this. Has some weight to it though. Portable, but doesn't collapse down to the same size as the smaller ones. Still really good.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: One property line is 750 feet this was just what I needed made my life easier
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Compact and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality measuring wheel. Better quality than the others I’ve purchased from home centers locally.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give a fair review as it is not my item.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Use this for exterior home inspections for measuring sq ft. Very easy to read and reset. I wish it had a strap to sling it over shoulder when not in use. The stand is not very helpful on grass. Overall it seems to be a durable object. Been using it regularly for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Roosterjenn

customer_reviews.title: A lot of tool for the money
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than I expected. Not a really heavy duty tool but if used just occasionally, it gets the job done and likely will for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: G. Michael Gougler

customer_reviews.title: not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It worked for my son's science experiment but I would not use it if you need to be very accurate. The measurement changes quickly if you don't hold it just right
customer_reviews.author: jmlock

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Big Wheel Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really think this is a great product. We use it to mark off our fields for flag football. It's solid, travels small, easy to use and read. I think a big wheel is better than a small wheel (a guess as I have no experiece with a small wheel).
customer_reviews.author: Andy McCone

customer_reviews.title: a little bulkier than I had expected. So fold ...
customer_reviews.text: a little bulkier than I had expected. So fold up is difficult to do because this will not fit in my luggage or other bags.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great!
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a kickstand and a storage case! Measuring is easy, just hit reset at the starting point to set "zero," and then roll! When measuring land, the hardest part will be determining the starting point.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

product_meta.title: TR Industrial Measuring Wheels (FX Series)
product_meta.description: Style:FX SeriesThis measuring wheel makes it easy to measure distance up to 9,999 feet in a variety of work environments. It is quite portable with 1-foot diameter wheel and a handle that is 2 feet and 9 inches, but is collapsible to about 1 foot and 4 inches. It has a very handy reset button, kickstand, and carrying bag. This unit is built with care; it includes an ergonomic grip on the handle, smooth wheels for rolling about, and heavy duty quality for long-term durability.
feature_bullets: Easily and accurately measure up to 9,999 feet in a variety of work environments
Handle is 2 feet and 9 inches, but is collapsible to about 1 foot and 4 inches
Extremely convenient reset button, kickstand, and carrying bag
Built with care - Ergonomic grip, smooth wheels, and heavy duty quality

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars733 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
